summary:
Stock Market Gains: SENSEX Up 400 Points Amid Mixed Performances

Publication Date: January 7, 2024 | Source: [News Website]

The domestic equity market showed positive momentum at the start of trading on Tuesday, with the S&P BSE SENSEX rising significantly, while mixed performances were observed in individual stocks.

  • The S&P BSE SENSEX was up 394.39 points, trading at 78,359.38.
  • The NSE's NIFTY50 index gained 135.60 points, reaching 23,751.65.
  • 43 out of 50 NIFTY50 components were in the green, while Zomato faced a notable decline.
  • Top gainers on the index included ONGC, Titan, and BPCL.
  • Zomato shares dropped over 4% amid concerns over competition.
“2025 could be a breather year for Zomato, with the stock likely shifting gears into a phase of price consolidation.” - Jefferies Analysts

The market showed broad sectoral gains, with oil and gas leading, while foreign institutional investors reportedly sold equities worth ₹2,575.06 crore yesterday.

title: OnePlus 13 series India launch: Date, timings, and how to watch live stream - The Indian Express
summary:
OnePlus 13 series India launch: Date, timings, and how to watch live stream

Date: Today   Source: Indian Express

OnePlus is set to unveil its latest products in a winter launch event, featuring the OnePlus 13 and OnePlus 13R along with other devices.

  • Launch event starts at 9:00 PM IST and can be viewed on YouTube.
  • Products available for purchase on Amazon, OnePlus stores, and other retailers.
  • OnePlus 13 includes Snapdragon 8 Elite chip, three 50 MP cameras, and a 32 MP selfie camera.
  • The OnePlus 13R is an affordable variant with Snapdragon 8 Gen 3 and a new telephoto lens option.
  • Both phones feature a 6,000 mAh battery with 100W fast charging and run on Android 15-based OxygenOS 15.
  • Expected pricing: OnePlus 13 between Rs 65,000 and Rs 70,000; OnePlus 13R below Rs 50,000.

title: Nvidia CEO unveils more powerful graphics cards at CES event - BusinessLine
Joe Biden slaps tight Donald Trump with this 72-year-old act just days before leaving - Hindustan Times
summary:
Biden Protects 625 Million Acres of Offshore Areas from Drilling Ahead of Trump's Presidency

Date: Jan 07, 2025 Source: Hindustan Times

In a significant move, President Joe Biden announced the protection of 625 million acres of offshore areas from oil and gas drilling, complicating plans for the incoming Donald Trump administration.

  • Biden utilizes the 1953 Outer Continental Shelf Lands Act to prevent future drilling in these areas.
  • The protected areas span the East and West coasts, Eastern Gulf of Mexico, and Alaska’s North Bering Sea.
  • Trump may require Congressional approval to reverse this decision due to the limitations of the OCSLA.
  • Biden asserts that drilling could cause irreversible damage and is unnecessary for national energy needs, especially amidst the climate crisis.
  • Incoming press secretary Karoline Leavitt criticized the decision as politically motivated, while industry leaders argue for the reversal of the protections to support energy production.
“Drilling in the areas I’m seeking to protect could cause irreversible damage... is not worth the risks.” - Joe Biden

This decision signals a strong stance on environmental protection as the Biden administration prepares to transition out while raising challenging questions for Trump's upcoming plans for energy expansion.
newTitle: Biden Protects 625 Million Acres of Offshore Areas from Drilling Ahead of Trump's Presidency

title: Election Commission to announce Delhi Assembly poll schedule at 2 pm today - Hindustan Times
summary:
Election Commission to Announce Delhi Assembly Poll Schedule Today at 2 PM

Date: January 7, 2025 Source: Hindustan Times

The Election Commission of India (ECI) is set to announce the schedule for the upcoming Assembly elections in Delhi, with a press conference scheduled for January 7 at 2 PM. The term of the current Assembly ends on February 23.

  • The ECI will reveal the election schedule at a press conference.
  • The last elections occurred on January 6, 2020, with polling on February 8.
  • The AAP is aiming for a third consecutive term, while the BJP seeks to gain control.
  • Congress is also preparing to challenge the AAP and BJP in the elections.
  • The AAP has released its candidate list for the elections, marking a proactive electoral strategy.
The AAP dominated the previous elections, winning 67 and 62 seats in 2015 and 2020 respectively.

The upcoming elections are critical for the political landscape in Delhi, especially after recent developments regarding political alliances and candidate selections.
newTitle: Election Commission to Announce Delhi Assembly Poll Schedule Today at 2 PM

title: Trump renews his offer of making Canada 51st state of U.S. after Trudeau resigns - The Hindu
summary:
Trump Proposes Canada as 51st State Following Trudeau's Resignation

Published: January 07, 2025 08:38 am IST

Source: The Hindu

In a surprising move, U.S. President-elect Donald Trump renewed his proposal to make Canada the 51st state shortly after Canadian Prime Minister Justin Trudeau announced his resignation amid declining popularity.

  • Trudeau announced his resignation as his party pushed him out, pending a leadership election.
  • Trump has suggested that Canada could benefit from merging with the U.S. through lower taxes and greater security.
  • He claims many Canadians support the idea, citing public sentiment on social media.
“Many people in Canada LOVE being the 51st State... Together, what a great Nation it would be!!!” - Donald Trump

Despite Trump's assertions, there has been little response from Canadian officials regarding the proposal.
newTitle: Trump Proposes Canada as 51st State Following Trudeau's Resignation

title: 2 Children Test Positive For HMPV In Maharashtra's Nagpur - News18
summary:
Two Children Test Positive For HMPV In Maharashtra's Nagpur

Date: January 07, 2025
Source: News18

Two children have tested positive for the Human Metapneumovirus (HMPV) in Maharashtra’s Nagpur. Aged 7 and 13 years, they experienced cough and fever, leading to testing for the virus.

  • Their test results confirmed positivity for HMPV.
  • Other cases have been reported in Karnataka, Tamil Nadu, and Gujarat.
  • Health authorities are monitoring the situation closely.
  • Union Health Minister JP Nadda assured there is no reason to panic.
“The health systems and surveillance network of the country remain vigilant in ensuring the country is ready to respond promptly to any emerging health challenge,” - JP Nadda

The detection of HMPV in these children forms part of a broader concern as respiratory illnesses rise globally, with health officials urging calm among the public.
newTitle: Two Children Test Positive for HMPV in Nagpur, Maharashtra

EXCLUSIVE | 'Workload management is bull****, created by Australians': Ex-India pacer on Jasprit Bumrah b - The Times of India
summary:
EXCLUSIVE | 'Workload management is bull****, created by Australians': Ex-India pacer on Jasprit Bumrah bowling 150-plus overs in Border-Gavaskar Trophy

Date: New Delhi

Source: Times of India

Jasprit Bumrah bowled an impressive 151.2 overs in the Border-Gavaskar Trophy, establishing himself as a key player. Despite his efforts, Australia managed to regain the trophy after a decade.

  • Bumrah took 32 wickets during the series.
  • He averaged 13.06 with an economy of 2.77.
  • Concerns about his workload arose after he left a match early due to injury.
  • Former cricketer Balwinder Sandhu criticized the concept of workload management, stating it is a creation of Australians.
"Workload management is bull****. I come from an era when cricketers used to listen to their bodies and no one else." - Balwinder Sandhu

Sandhu emphasized that bowlers should handle higher overs and questioned the necessity of managing workloads given modern medical support.
newTitle: Ex-India Pacer Critiques Workload Management After Bumrah's High Over Count in Border-Gavaskar Trophy

title: Winter storm: Polar Vortex freezes much of US; over 9,000 flights disrupted - The Times of India
summary:
Winter storm: Polar Vortex freezes much of US; over 9,000 flights disrupted

Publication Date: January 2023 Source: Times of India

A powerful winter storm, driven by a polar vortex, has brought freezing temperatures and severe weather to much of the United States. Over 9,000 flights have been disrupted as airports grapple with heavy snowfall and icy conditions.

  • The storm has led to a significant drop in temperatures across various states.
  • Thousands of flights were canceled or delayed, stranding passengers and complicating travel plans.
  • Reports of power outages have increased as snow accumulates on power lines and equipment.
  • Residents are advised to stay indoors and avoid unnecessary travel during the storm.
"This is one of the most severe winter storms we have seen in recent years, impacting millions of people across the nation." - Meteorologist

The storm is expected to continue affecting travel and daily activities in the coming days, with forecasts suggesting that conditions may improve by the weekend.
newTitle: Winter Storm Causes Major Disruptions Across the US

The successful listing of Indo Farm Equipment's shares marks a significant event in the financial market, showcasing the company's strong market interest and backing by investors.

7 Best Space Photos Captured by NASA Hubble Telescope

Discover the magnificent images captured by NASA's Hubble Space Telescope in 2024, showcasing some of the most stunning celestial phenomena.

  • This article explores seven remarkable images taken by the Hubble Space Telescope.
  • Highlights include the Crab Nebula and the densely packed globular cluster NGC 1841.
  • Features images depicting galaxies and nebulae located millions of light-years away.
  • Images reveal scientific phenomena, including supernova remnants and galaxy collisions.

What happens now that Trudeau is resigning as Canada’s Prime Minister? Who is Anita Anand? - The Hindu
summary:
What happens now that Trudeau is resigning as Canada’s Prime Minister? Who is Anita Anand?

Date: January 07, 2025 | Source: The Hindu

Canadian Prime Minister Justin Trudeau announced he would step down after nine years due to poor polling numbers as his party prepares for a new leader and upcoming elections. He will remain in office until a new leader is chosen.

  • Trudeau will not leave office immediately; he will remain Prime Minister until a new leader is selected.
  • Parliament is prorogued until March 24, delaying potential non-confidence motions from opposition parties.
  • The government aims to conclude the leadership process quickly to avoid potential electoral defeat.
  • Anita Anand is a potential candidate to replace Trudeau, currently serving as Minister of Transport.
  • The governor general has ultimate power but is unlikely to dismiss Trudeau while he retains parliamentary confidence.
“The governor general won't dismiss a prime minister who still holds the confidence of the Commons.” – Philippe Lagasse

As Canada prepares for a political transition, the Liberal Party faces significant challenges in its upcoming leadership selection and potential elections.
newTitle: Trudeau Resigns: What’s Next for Canada’s Leadership and Who is Anita Anand?

title: Kajal Aggarwal and Akshay Kumar pair up once again for this special film - 123telugu
summary:
Kajal Aggarwal and Akshay Kumar Team Up Again for Special Film 'Kannappa'

Published on Jan 7, 2025 7:50 am IST

Bollywood star Akshay Kumar will soon be seen in the film Sky Force, releasing during the Republic Day weekend. Following this, he will make his Telugu debut in Vishnu Manchu’s film 'Kannappa', set to release in April 2025.

  • Akshay Kumar plays Lord Shiva in the film 'Kannappa'.
  • Kajal Aggarwal portrays Goddess Parvathi.
  • This is their second collaboration after the hit film 'Special 26'.
  • The cast includes Mohanlal, Sarathkumar, Mohan Babu, and others.
  • Mukesh Kumar Singh is directing the film, with Mohan Babu producing it.
“Initially, there were speculations about Prabhas portraying Lord Shiva, but it has been confirmed that Akshay is taking on the role.”

This film marks a significant collaboration in Akshay Kumar's expanding career into Telugu cinema.
newTitle: Kajal Aggarwal and Akshay Kumar Team Up Again for Special Film 'Kannappa'

title: Nifty 50, Sensex today: What to expect from Indian stock market in trade on January 7 as HMPV virus cases rise | Stock Market News - Mint
summary:
Indian Stock Market Outlook for January 7 Amid Rising HMPV Virus Cases

Publication Date: January 7, 2023 | Source: Live Mint

The Indian stock market is anticipated to open higher on January 7 following positive trends in global markets, despite experiencing a significant downturn on January 6.

  • Benchmark indices Sensex and Nifty 50 fell sharply on January 6, with Sensex dropping 1,258.12 points and Nifty 50 slipping below 23,700.
  • Gift Nifty indicates a potential upward opening for Nifty 50.
  • Short-term trends suggest potential further weakness with next support levels around 23,500 to 23,400.
  • Technical indicators present a mixed outlook, with caution advised due to unclear market direction.
  • Bank Nifty also faced declines and is nearing critical support zones.
“The candle pattern of Monday is indicating a bull trap of recent upside breakout and this signals more weakness in the short term.” - Nagaraj Shetti, Senior Technical Research Analyst

The market's immediate trajectory remains uncertain, with investors advised to monitor key support and resistance levels closely.
newTitle: Indian Stock Market Outlook for January 7 Amid Rising HMPV Virus Cases

summary:
Sana Khan and Anas Saiyad welcome their second child, a baby boy

Date: January 07, 2025 Source: Hindustan Times

Actor Sana Khan and her husband, Anas Saiyad, announced the arrival of their second child, a baby boy, born on January 5. They shared their joy on Instagram, expressing their happiness over the new addition to their family.

  • Sana and Anas welcomed their second son just nine months after the birth of their first child, Tariq Jamil.
  • The couple announced the birth with a heartfelt post, thanking Allah for the blessing of their new child.

Tom Holland And Zendaya Are Engaged!

Date: January 07, 2025 Source: News18

Tom Holland and Zendaya have exchanged rings in an intimate ceremony, marking their engagement. Initial reports suggest that the ceremony involved only the couple without any family members.

  • The couple's engagement coincided with Zendaya sporting a large diamond ring at the Golden Globes.
  • During an interview, Zendaya expressed her acceptance of living part of her life publicly while maintaining control over what she shares.

title: 7.1 magnitude earthquake in Nepal, tremors felt in Delhi-NCR - Hindustan Times
summary:
7.1 Magnitude Earthquake Strikes Nepal, Tremors Felt in Delhi-NCR

Date: Jan 07, 2025 Source: HT News

A 7.1 magnitude earthquake struck Nepal on Tuesday morning, with tremors felt across Delhi-NCR and parts of North India including Bihar. Fortunately, no property damage has been reported.

  • The earthquake occurred at 6:35 AM IST, 93 km northeast of Lobuche.
  • People in Bihar were seen evacuating their homes during the tremors.
  • The earthquake's epicenter was near the Nepal-Tibet border, a seismically active area.
  • Two aftershocks of magnitudes 4.7 and 4.9 were recorded shortly after the main quake.
“EQ of M: 7.1, On: 07/01/2025 06:35:18 IST.” - National Centre for Seismology

The occurrence of this earthquake highlights the ongoing seismic activity in the region, prompting monitoring from geological authorities.
newTitle: 7.1 Magnitude Earthquake Strikes Nepal, Tremors Felt in Delhi-NCR

title: First Time In 136 Years: Shan Masood Ton Helps Pakistan Set Massive Follow-On Record vs South Africa.. - NDTV Sports
summary:
First Time In 136 Years: Shan Masood Ton Helps Pakistan Set Massive Follow-On Record vs South Africa

Publication Date: Not specified Source: NDTV

Pakistan fought valiantly but ultimately lost to South Africa in the second Test at Cape Town, despite a remarkable 478 runs in the second innings while following on, led by captain Shan Masood's 145.

  • Pakistan set a record total of 478 while following on, the highest by a visiting team in South Africa in 136 years.
  • The previous record for the highest follow-on total was 372/7 by Australia in 1902.
  • Shan Masood's innings of 145 was pivotal along with significant contributions from Babar Azam (81) and other batsmen.
  • Despite the impressive total, South Africa chased down a target of 58 runs comfortably.
  • The win secured South Africa's top position in the World Test Championship table.
“It surpasses the previous best follow-on total of 372/7 set by Australia in Johannesburg in 1902.”

In conclusion, while Pakistan put up a historic performance, South Africa confirmed their dominance by clinching the series 2-0 and setting their sights on the upcoming World Test Championship final.
newTitle: Shan Masood Leads Pakistan to Historic Follow-On Record Against South Africa

title: Aubrey Plaza calls husband Jeff Baena's suicide an 'unimaginable tragedy' - TOI Etimes
summary:
Aubrey Plaza Calls Husband Jeff Baena's Suicide an 'Unimaginable Tragedy'

Date: January 6, 2023 | Source: Times of India

Aubrey Plaza, the actress known for her role in 'Parks and Recreation', has expressed her grief publicly following the tragic death of her husband, Jeff Baena, who died by suicide at the age of 47.

  • Plaza and Baena's families released a statement describing his death as an 'unimaginable tragedy' and thanked supporters for their kindness.
  • The couple, who began dating in 2001, married in May 2021.
  • Baena was an independent filmmaker and had collaborated with Plaza on multiple projects.
  • His death led Plaza to withdraw from presenting duties at the 82nd Golden Globes, where the couple was acknowledged with tributes from the industry.
  • Baena's legacy includes directing Plaza in 'The Little Hours' and co-writing films like 'I Heart Huckabees'.
“This is an unimaginable tragedy. We are deeply grateful to everyone who has offered support. Please respect our privacy during this time.”

The loss of Jeff Baena has profoundly affected Aubrey Plaza, and she requests respect for their family's privacy as they navigate this difficult time.
newTitle: Aubrey Plaza Calls Husband Jeff Baena's Suicide an 'Unimaginable Tragedy'

title: India's Champions Trophy Squad: Not Hardik Or Gill, This Star To Be Vice-Captain, Says Report - NDTV Sports
summary:
India's Champions Trophy Squad: Not Hardik Or Gill, This Star To Be Vice-Captain, Says Report

Date: 13 June 2024 | Source: NDTV

The announcement of India's squad for the ICC Champions Trophy 2025 is upcoming, with reports suggesting Rohit Sharma will captain and Jasprit Bumrah is expected to be vice-captain, pending recovery from injury.

  • Rohit Sharma is confirmed to lead India in the Champions Trophy.
  • Jasprit Bumrah is likely to be named vice-captain, replacing Hardik Pandya and Shubman Gill.
  • Bumrah's fitness is uncertain after an injury in the final Test against Australia.
  • The vice-captaincy role has seen significant changes in recent years.
“The vice-captaincy in limited-overs cricket has switched hands considerably.”

Should Bumrah be unable to play, it could lead to further debates on the vice-captaincy choice, leaving India with no clear frontrunner.
newTitle: Jasprit Bumrah Set to Be India's Vice-Captain for Champions Trophy
